# galaxy_service_account (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) A service account

### Read-Only

- `additional_role_ids` (List of String) Additional roles (read only)
- `passwords` (Attributes List) Passwords (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--passwords))
- `role_id` (String) Default role (read only)
- `service_account_id` (String) Service account ID (read only)
- `user_name` (String) Service account user name (read only)

<a id="nestedatt--passwords"></a>
### Nested Schema for `passwords`

Read-Only:

- `created` (String) Creation time (read only)
- `description` (String) Description (read only)
- `last_login` (String) Last login time (read only)
- `password` (String) Service account password (read only)
- `password_prefix` (String) Service account password prefix (read only)
- `service_account_password_id` (String) Service account password ID (read only)
